content.detailedDescription: Was at my home on arabian dr in lake havasu. i was watching a f-16 plane fly over the city. i grabbed my binoculars too see it more clearly. as the plane headed west towards calif. i lowered my glasses to get a bearing on direction and i was looking west just above the horizon when i saw a flash. it initialy appeard to be of metal but the plane had gone north of my location. i was on the south facing side of my home so i lost the plane but was taken by the flash west of me. i looked west and could not see anything. i then used the glasses (binoculars) and saw what did appear as a cigar just above the desert floor. the craft was yellow-orange in color and had a band of a darker color towards one end. this appeared as a cigar band on a cigar. i took the glasses away and could not see any thing with eyes only but when i put glasses back up i found it again. th craft appeared to be 20-30 miles away. it was stationary not appearing to move at all when suddenly it was just gone before my eyes. i walked around the front of the home and could not locate the object. there was no change in sun light or clouds as there was none. in 2009 iwas watching a show called ufo hunters and they were in england talking to a pilot who,over the english observed 2 or 3 of the same craft i saw. i was charged. only know am i reporting but this craft is real and man i hope more have seen it...
content.summary: Viewing f-16 flying and observed large cigar craft.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting a ride to work from my mother. it was sunny out, almost no clouds at all. while driving down courthouse road (approaching jefferson davis highway) i noticed the glint of a metallic object in the sky,  north of us and travelling in the same direction at between (about)18,000ft and (about)27,000ft altitude. i always try to identify any plane/helicopter i see, that being said, i focused on the object, thats when i noticed it didn't seem to have any wings. i thought "maybe it's a commercial plane banking in this direction." except there was no tail to the craft, so i was quite puzzled. after approximatley 20 seconds of watching the craft it suddenly stopped completely (my jaw dropped), thinking it was my eyes/brain creating an illusion of it stopping because the car had stopped at a light or something, i looked around only to find out that was not the case and that we were still cruising along. i then resumed watching the object/craft and it continued to hover for 3 to 5 seconds, at which time it doubled back on its previous course at two to three times the speed while ascending at a (visually at least) 5 degree climb. i kept watching it until the roof of the car blocked my line of sight. i was absolutley estatic about seeing what i had, so started watching the sky very closely and saw a formation of two chinook helicopters approaching from the south at a maximum of 1500ft alt. (not 15,000-i repeat 1500ft). when they got probably a football field and a half away from us, the two helicopter made a hard bank left in the direction that the object went i suspect they had just been told to try and tail the object due to them being in the area already (possibly while en route to quantico).
content.summary: Object moving west/northwest came to full stop and accelerated in opposite direction

content.detailedDescription:
38 yrs later met up with same person while visiting someone. as soon as i saw her the first thing out of both our mouths & chillswas. remember the ufo we saw that night? neither one of us had ever mentioned it to anyone for all that time. it was very large and hovered could not see anyone looking out of windows but felt like i was bring watched. traveling north on east avenue towards strawberry ave it felt like it took a very long time to go approximately 3 blocks. fear was overwhelming & we both agreed to never speak of the incident ever again. i never did. until that night when i walked into my friends house and saw this person after 38 yrs. i had always wondered about her but never mentioned the incident to anyone.
for both of us upon seeing each other after that long a time to say the same thing at the same time after swearing we would never speak of it ever again was spooky. i think our mutual friend thought we were crazy. i was 17 when it happened and 57 when i ever spoke of it again. the object was nothing of this world and so big and hovering so low over an open field that you would have to have been blind not to see it. it was just above the tree tops. it just hovered. i was overcome with immence fear and put the pedal to the metal of the car i was driving. i felt like the car was not moving and that it took a very long time to get away from the object. i cannot remember the time reference now. i never looked back and never mentioned it to anyone...Who would have believed me at that time. no one believes anyone now!
content.summary: Larger than football field-windows surrounded veh.-lights-felt like someone was watching me-immence fear-felt like long time driving to get away- persons with me saw same thing-fear engulfed us both-we both decided not to ever speak of incident-did not

content.detailedDescription:
i worked for gte for thirty plus years and my wife at the time owned and operated a preschool on a public school system property. my wife,two kids, 7 and 11, and i were driving home after picking up the kids at grandmas. we lived in hauser a little community north of north bend, oregon. we turned off of hwy 101 onto north bay drive and then we made a left onto north way, where we lived 3'2 miles up the inlet. as we turned left we saw two very bright lights on top of the mountain abpout a mile away. the mountain makes the road split into two roads, one short road to the left and no. way to the right. i thought and then said "they must be doing hoot owl logging". the practise of logging at night when temps are lower. but almost immedeatly we both said that's odd as is wasn't that hot, we lived on the coast and they wouldn't start that early anyway. we watched as we drove up on the pavement and about a mile up the lights went away. we were trying to figure that out as we ended the pavemet and turned right on the gravel.  i said 
"tommorow morning i am going to drive up the montain and see who's doing what." as we rounded the corner we saw this big cicle craft with a ring of lights attached to it, and the lights on the craft rotated around pretty fast. we stopped the car and as both my wife and i opened our doors, my kids had rolled down the windows in our two door. right over our heads this craft was hovering directly above the trees and us. maybe 50 or so feet high. i said something like "oh my god what is that?" we watched for a short time and as we were watching it made a wooshing sound anf lifted and headed to the right, which was away from the mountain, and toward the field. we couldn't see an more of this craft. it was shocking, interesting and any doubt that some one or thing has a craft like this is long gone for all of us. it was something to see and we talked about it often. unbelievable yet it happeded to us. i told many and i'm sure behind my back some laughed at me. i don't care. it happened exactly as me or my ex wife and kids would tell you. thanks for listening. *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Approx 40-50' across on a  circle of light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in high school, either a freshman or sophomore. i lived in a highly wooded area, about 24 acres, but in the city, still no lights were visible. only radio towers and sometimes a house light in the far distance could be seen but very rarely did this ever happen. the radio tower was very close, so it's light was very high up in the sky. the house light was only visible when you were directly at the window, and looking south-east. it was fall/winter because leaves were not on the trees. my window faced the east, as did my bed. 
i was laying in bed one night, and looked out my window from across the room. i noticed something that was not normally there. it was a red light at about eye level with me. me being on the 2nd floor on my home i thought "hmm, that's really odd.." and didnt really think anything of it. but as i laid in bed, i began to wonder.. i looked back up and the circular light was still there. i sat and stared at it for a moment, and it began to slightly move. i thought it was my eyes playing tricks on me, so i looked harder. as i moved my head up and down to see if it was just me, the light stayed level with my eyes. at this point, i was pretty freaked out. i got out of bed to investigate, which is very uncharacteristic of me, because i am a scardy-cat. me being young, i thought that someone was in the tree recording me or something, but i wasnt scared in the least. it was almost as if it drew me towards it, and i was calm. as i stared harder into the pitch black woods, it seemed to fade away. i thought it was very strange and fell asleep. the next night it was visible again. and the next. after that, it would sometimes be there, sometimes not. about 2 weeks passed with no orbs in sight. one night that it appeared i was staring at it, and it split into two orbs that began revolving in a figure eight pattern. i again was "drawn" to the window. i just stared. i really did not know what it was. the two red orbs would almost "chase" each other, and then return to the one orb, still moving in a figure eight pattern. after another night of the two orbsi remember telliing my mom that i saw it and she just really disregarded it, as any skeptical mother would her child. i was never scared, just very interested, which sparked my intrest in shows like ufo files and ufo hunters. i loved it. 2 years ago we moved houses, and was home watching my favorite show ufo hunters. the episode was about orbs. i didnt think anything about it until it showed an artist's rendering of an orb, and the feelings that it caused in people. i froze. it was the exact type of thing that i saw 4(ish) years ago. i knew that what i saw was not ordinary or normal. i never got any bad feelings from staring at it, i was calm and curious. i am a freshman in college, intelligent, from a good family, high test scores, and otherwise honest. i am telling my story for the first time. thank you.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb moving in a figure 8 pattern in the middle of the woods, seemed close, calming effect.

content.detailedDescription: On friday, 2/18/2011. i went to let my two dogs outside. i was standing on my side porch looking east. at first i noticed how the moon was behind an evergreen tree that is in my yard. the tree is approximately 60 ft high. it was cloudy out and one of the clouds that was a darker white was located to the left of the tree. when comparing it to the evergreen tree it was approximately 48 ft high to the left of the tree. the clouds seemed to be one mile away and less than 800 ft high in the sky.  in this whiter cloud there was a very bright orange light the size of a golf ball at arms length. it started to move leaving a orange very bright line in the cloud. it reminded me of taking a laser pointer and drawing a straight line horizontally across the cloud about two feet. the light beam stayed for about 10 seconds then disappeared. i yelled for my husband who was in his office in the basement.  i looked at the time on the stove and it was 8:46pm. went back on the porch. before he could get up stairs, in the same cloud. four more beams. orange in color and very bright, same in size, length just like the first one came straight down leaving its orange beams stayed for about 10 seconds. then all four disappeared at the same time. my husband didn't get to see them. it just scared him because of the way i yelled and one of our dogs where barking. i wasn't scared, just more in amazement. i did get goosebumps and kept looking out the window. my dog kept wanting to go outside and kept barking. she would only go outside if i would go out with her and wouldn't leave my side all night.
content.summary: One orange beam  horizontal and four orange beam's exactly the same came down staying inside a cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself *(wit's and wife's name deleted--cms/sg) earley morning about 7:00 am was traveling southeast at 70 miles an hour from a visit to my parents.It was approx.58 degrees in november 2001,partly cloudy with blue skies in the background.My wife said what is that up there?,i said what?Then i looked up tp my left in the sky and saw an object.1 then 2 objects shaped like two triangles the skin on the object was like a mirror or polished aluminum.They were moving or floating northwest.I have been in aviation as a mechanic and a flight crew member for 28 years at the time.I knew of england air force base 60 miles away but it had been closed for years.Then the sun's rays hit the skin of the object and it was blinding like a mirror,i thought maybe it was world war ii aircraft with polished aluminum but those are special and have to have a permitt from the faa to have that type skin.Then i looked for wings,there was no rotor blades,propellers,exhaust,ice crystals as if jet at high altitude,no noise just moving to our left silently.Then there was4 more shapes appeared just like the first 2 shapes.They were about 300ft.To 600ft.They were in a flight formation of one on top two underneath then 2 under that then one under that.I said to my wife what is that she said it looks like triangle polished aliminum shark fins.I replied yes that is what i see.I had a video camera in the back seat but i though if i stop they will be gone.Then they flew thru some light clouds then disappering by 2 then down to 1 then they were gone.I have searched the internet and found that shape in somebody else's photo.I stil;l question my wife what did u see she said polished flying shark fins,she don't want me to ask her anymore because she said i'm going to drive her crazy!I keep asking her over and over just to confirm what i saw and she agreess with me.I have told a couple of family and friends but they just act like i was not talking to them.I wished i could have stopped and got the video.I just started talking about this in the end of 2010.I have sketched the shapes and put them in their flight formation we saw at the time.Could not attach microsoft power 
point of flight formatiom.
content.summary: Travel from natchitoches,la. to alexanderia,la. to new orleans i-49 south.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my local library taking a break outside having a cigarette all alone when a white object in the western sky caught my eye. it was out far towards the mountains in the western sky flying in a straight line directly over head, i assumed it was a plastic shopping bag caught in an updraft but as i continued gazing up, as it came closer into view i recognized what appeared to be two sets of flapping wings two pointing forward and two facing backwards kind of like how butterflies wings are positioned. i also noticed the humanoid was clothed in a long flowing white gown that fluttered in the wind and if i had to give an estimate of how high this thing was in the sky i would say the same altitude as commercial plaines flying over colorado. i also realized this thing must be huge if i would compare it to a human i would guesstamate it to be at least 4 to 5 times larger. it took all of 15 min to past me and as it did i thought out loud (don't go come back) and it did. it banked to its left turning in my direction and coming down at me in an almost 3 dimensional effect i felt like a gold fish in an aquarium and a huge human hand was reaching in to grab me. i asked my self is it really coming at me...I then took a step back filled with excitement and fear and shouted go away! it complied . it then turned back in the direction it was going and continued on. i watched it until it was a speck in the east sky it was by far the weirdest experience i have ever had.
content.summary: I witnessed what looked like an angel high up in the sky flying from west to east directly over head

content.detailedDescription: I experienced this sighting around 2001. it was in denver colorado in the month of aug. around 4pm i was in the back yard sitting on a trampoline with my then girlfriend at her house looking up in the sky and out of no where two balls of light shoot threw a small cloud that was right over head,blue and red and they looked like they were playing tag like children and they were so bright they glowed during the day. i vividly remember the light shining threw the cloud in the middle of the day....That freaked my girl friend out something crazy. as she ran off into the house terrified i stayed and watched them dematerialize into thin air then they come back in the middle of the cloud and bolt up into the atmosphere. not more than 3-4 minutes passed when two air-force jets came screaming out of the east right threw the very cloud i witnessed the lights..... obvious radar detection .I believe they were two f-15's i remember thinking those are tactical fighters meant for one purpose.... air superiority. each orb had its own unique color, the lighter one was more blue than white and the reddish one more of a amber color. the interceptors made one low ( i meen low) pass threw the cloud where the orbs were witnessed but later on 5 minutes or so ) i heard the jets far of in the distance but at a much higher altitude this time round. the sky was clear only a hand full of clouds in the sky. my then girlfriend was terrified possibly because she thought they were some kind of demonic force or angelic, i later asked her to verify what we had seen and she described it as seeing angels and demons in the sky...What an imagination, my self had no fear at all during the sighting. i just felt fascination and a thirst for an explanation. i recall seeing them when i was younger ma-by around the age of 7, i'm 33 years old now and i asked my late grandmother if she recalls seeing balls of light fallowing us in the fields along the highway on our way from texas to colorado and she confirmed.
content.summary: Two balls of lintense light chasing eachother buring the day.

content.detailedDescription: I've seen flashing object before but didn't know what to think. some nights there and some nights it isn't. i work at shands@uf and it is clearly visible if you stand on archer rd. and look east in the sky.
content.summary: I see the same flashing pattern in the eastern sky

content.detailedDescription: My son was taking our dogs out when he came back in to the house really excited. he was telling us to go outside something weird was in the sky. i went out to see what it was assuming he saw a plane or helicopter,because we really dont live very far from a small local airport. it was about 8:05pm on a thursday night when i looked up and in the distance there was an object pretty far up in the sky and it seemed stationary, but it was flashing brightly and different colors and after watching it constantly for over an hour it never moved even though we watched several other aircrafts go up and they appeared to get very close to it and then they would continue on their path. it was so strange whenever anything seemed to get close to it in the air it would start rapidly changing colors and flashing faster. after the airplanes were gone the flashing object didnt flash so fast. it just was too strange i was trying to explain to my children what it was they saw but honestly i dont know what i saw i know what i think it was and to me i have never seen any aircraft stay in the same place for over an hour and act like it has a mind of its own anytime something got too close. i had to stop watching it because i had to put the kids to bed but as of 9:22 pm its still in the same spot.
content.summary: Star like didnt move but flashed colors and different lite patterns

content.detailedDescription: In feb. of 2010 i was looking at the full moon. i was standing outside on the pier were i live. the moon was about three hand widths above the horizon. too orientate readers the top of the moon is north to the left is west. about 20 degrees to the left or west i watched a fast very fast star-light object shoot out from behind the moon. the object moved about 12 inches from the moon, slightly away, that is outward from the moons orbit. it then turned more outward and was gone in less then three seconds!
content.summary: I was looking at the full moon  when a fast, very fast star-light object ---

content.detailedDescription:
We live out of the city limits so stars are always clear on a clear night. people in the city of ottawa usually cannot see the stars due to lights from the city.  anyway, this is the second time i have seen an object as i stood on my deck that is not a plane or stars. its pretty clear actually. one is very big and a perfect triangle with a light in three places.  the other appears smaller but it is much higher up so i don't know. they just stayed there in the same place the whole time. what i do know is, the smaller one was an elongnated triangle and it was blinking red and blue. i watched it for over an hour.  my sons friend who is about 22-23 years old came over and he started showing me different star systems and named them by name. i pointed to the smaller triangle and asked him what was that?  he said, "i don't know, it looks like a ship." we laughed a little, but we both just kept looking at it. i asked him if he thought what i was seeing as a perfect triangle looked like a ship and he said, "it seems different than stars--maybe". after a while he left and i starred for maybe a half hour trying to get a better mental picture of the big one and finally went into the house. i felt stange at the time and got a bit light headed looking up for so long. i don't have cameras that would have taken a good picture.

now, i am a school teacher and i just pay attention to things. this is not the first time i have seen something like this.  i saw a really big triangle one time just over the other side of the river, north of the town bridge this past fall. it just stayed there.  i kept looking for information as its hard for me to believe no one else saw this.  well, if they did, they didn't report it. i figured i should mind my own buisness so never said anything, but now, it seems odd to see it again and this time another one at that. i am going to talk to the tech person at my school and find out what kind of camera to buy to get a good shot for long distance and have it on the ready.  my cell phone would not have been able to pick this up so i didn't bother.  anyway, i just thought someone needed to say something and i'll keep my eyes open and get a camera.  if you have any advice, i'd like to hear it. its rather spooky because we are a small town of about 18,000 people stretched out all over a pretty big area. i cannot figure what the attraction would be, but i'm telling you i saw those two triangle whatever they were.
content.summary: There were two objects that were in the sky--way up.  this is not the first time i have seen it, but this time my sons friend saw them too.

content.detailedDescription: It was a sunday afternoon, i was grilling in my backyard. my wife and kids had just gone inside. something in the sky caught my eye; i looked up to see a black diamond shaped object in the southern area of the sky traveling north at an incredible rate of speed, it was completely silent, it stopped suddenly went east stopped suddenly again and continued north. it was black, diamond shaped but not pointy more rounded. it had neon blueish indigo-ish lights, like no color i have ever seen, that were spinning too fast to count. it a appeared very large and was about half way between me and the clouds. i had goosebumps for a half hour after it was gone. for a week before and every night since the sighting i have awoke unexplainably every morning at exactly 3 am. ; i'm not sure if it is related or not. this was not my first sighting, but it was the first one during daylight.
content.summary: Black diamond-shaped ufo over cameron, tx

content.detailedDescription:
Note: i am guessing at the year, as i really don't know for sure. seems like around 2002 or so.

i was sitting on my front porch steps, looking at a clump of telephone wires that had been tied off in a spidery looking shape. day-dreaming, resting. my eyes absent-mindedly followed one of the telephone lines over my sidewalk, to my right, and that is how i happened to notice a very distinct, yet almost unnoticeable (if i hadn't have looked almost exactly at it's spot accidently) silver-ish tiny 'dot'(a teensy bit bigger than a dot) just off the phone-line, to my perspective.  it was obviously miles away, to north, and quite high up. so i just kept staring at it, wondering what it could possibly be. this was broad daylight, but i could see the sunlight glinting off of it to 'its' west, the direction of the sun at that time. 

one thing that struck me also, was that there's no way i would ever have noticed it, unless i looked almost exactly at its spot in the sky. but i wonder how it may have looked to anyone under it, or nearer to it.  

i didn't dare take my eyes off of it, for fear i'd lose it.  so i sat there for a good 10 mins, thinking about the oddity of it. mainly that it
kept it's exact position as i referenced it to the telephone line (as my marker). it wasn't moving in relation to me. after about 10 mins., i finally decided to run inside to see if my binoculars were somewhere easy to find. no, couldn't find them quickly so i went back outside and looked and it was still there, so i sat back down to keep watching it.  

after another minute (approx.) i saw it shoot to the west, slightly upward in a split second, and then it was gone.

i think about it a lot, even these many years later. wish i could see it again. ;-d 

p.S. i did try to figure out approx what area it was over, which i realized was hard to fathom exactly due to how high and i didn't really know how big/far it was.  but one thing in it's 'general' area, was the old trojan nuclear plant that used to be located just outside goble, oregon.  they destroyed it a few years ago.  but it still stood at the time i saw this silver, stationary dot in that direction.
content.summary: Tiny metallic shining dot stayed exactly in place, very high and miles over from me. after approx 10 mins, shot to the west, disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were on route 7, driving back to fredericton from grand bay, when we saw something very strange.  i was in the passenger seat.  it was about 9:15 pm, and we were a few kilometres past the petersville hill exit on the highway.  we noticed two exceedingly bright, large lights  to our right, which were the colour of a camp fire.  we could see two plumes of what appeared to be smoke rising almost vertically from the lights.  we were traveling 110km/h, and the lights stayed with us for several kms, but the whole time the ���smoke��� continue to rise more or less vertically.  the whole time they were moving with us, they stayed roughly the same distance apart from each other, and were at a minimum 500��� altitude , probably closer to 1000���.  they stayed at basically the same altitude the whole time.  after about 10 minutes, they seemed to ���slow down��� so i had to turn and look out of the passenger side rear window to see them.  

just as the first two became obscured by the trees along the highway, i turned toward the front of the car and immediately noticed another single light at about 2 o���clock, which just ���appeared���.   i looked back, and at this point there was only one of the original two back there, so it was as if one of them rushed to and/or ���appeared��� at the new position ahead of us.  this time, it didn���t keep pace, and i kept my eyes on it until we reached the junction with the trans-canada at oromocto.

when i first saw the lights, i immediately thought they were flares, possibly being used for a night exercise at cfb gagetown, but that couldn���t be the case because there was nothing holding them up.  the light and smoke looked like fire, but there were no columns of flame or anything like that ��� they were just orbs.  i have seen those chinese paper lanterns that people send into the sky, but there is no possible way it was something like that.

although i am fully convinced that et vehicles have and are visiting earth, i���m not sold that this was an et phenomena, but i can���t figure out what it might be. 

i took some photos with my camera phone, but of course they don���t show anything useful as it was dark and i was taking them out of a moving car.
content.summary: 2 or more moving bright orange  fireballs

content.detailedDescription: Large well lite craft with 3 huge light appeared at a very low alltitude and banked hard and lights went out.A dozen very light blue lights moved about the area and circled my location flashing very quickly in a random pattern but never going to far from my location.Large craft 1st spotted reappeared at times just above the treeline to the west.Then lights again went out.Blue lights flew directly over my location and what seemed like small craft reveiled they were a very large craft with almost no lights on and the only one on that was on was onthe very edge of the huge craft.The craft was at least a city block long and holding a tight but slow circular pattern around my location.The large craft appeared close and higher above the tree line.One light disappeared as it rotated out of view and another came on large and bright in the center of the craft.Ithought the object was going to pass right over me but it backed away instead and the lights went out again.I could here the roar of a jet approaching.I saw its lights as it passed overhead.All activity seased but started back up not three minutes after the jet left the area.The large craft reappeared 2 lights showing and looked again as if were going to pass right over me.Once again the lights went out and i could here the roar of a jet approaching the area again.I saw the jet streak through the area and the activity stopped again.I left the area and  saw a large bright object high in the sky.It was located directly over a rural home.I could see folks standing on the front porch and vehicle parking lights on.I stopped to get a pictue of the object above the house.It began moving away and i could easily see it had triangular lights on the bottom but my pictures didnt come out as good as they should have of this slow moving craft.Captured many pictures and some video of these events but they do not do justice to what i personally witnessed.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Strange objects and lights swarming north east of coleman,texas

content.detailedDescription:
1973, (i want to say it was late summer) i was a marine corp. air traffic controller stationed at mcas santa ana, ca.  we concluded air operations at about 10:00 p.M.  this particular night it was my turn to take the trash down while the rest of the crew finished the days flight strips and straightened up for morning operations.  i was standing at the base of the tower in the dark, the airfield lights were off.  i was wondering what was taking my co-workers so long and looked up to see if the interior tower lights were off (which would indicate they were on their way down).  the lights were off.  as i was looking up, i observed what appeared to be a formation of high flying, extremely fast moving aircraft, traveling from the west to the east.  i couldn't hear any sound of jet engines (santa ana is in fairly close proximity to the el toro marine air base where a number of fighter squadrons are based).  i immediately concluded two things; one, they were too high to be jet aircraft (the individual craft appeared to be a little bit bigger than a satellite, but two, they were traveling about the speed of what i had seen on other occasions in the night sky and guessed the object to be a satellite.

the flight path west to east was observed for maybe three to four seconds, when abuptly they stopped almost directly over head.  i couldn't tell if they slowed, it didn't appear to me they did, but i am certain they stopped suddenly.  maybe, not more that a second or two, but then took off again, heading due south towards san diego.  their speed appeared to be the same as i initially observed on the easterly course.  just before they were to get out of my vision, (maybe three seconds) i observed them to stop again.  another short pause and i observed them track back east bound, where i lost sight of them.  

i of course told my fellow controllers what i had seen and none of them took me serious.  i never really pursued the incident after that but whenever anyone talked about the possibility of ufo's i would always relate my incredulous observations of that night.

one night, i guess it was a year or so ago now, i was watching television.  it was a program on ufo's and this program in particular featured a gentleman who lived in england who had seen what he believed to be a ufo.  i don't recall the specifics of his sighting but he drew on a piece of paper for his interviewers what the formation he saw looked like.  it appeared to be very close to the same formation i had seen in 1973.  i say close because, i can't remember if the v- formation had three or four aircraft on one side.  what i mean to say is that the v-formation we often see in our own military aircraft fly-by's or even in birds was not the same length on each side.  it appeared that there was four or five craft on one side and two or three on the other.  i say craft per side because even at the height they were at, it didn't appear to me that the lights didn't appear to be evenly spaced.  i got the impression that each of the lights were separate craft.

the point is that this person saw the same thing i had seen probably twenty or so years earlier, (i assume his sighting was in the 1990's)  i had always wondered if anyone else had seen what i observed.  i did watch the paper and listen to the news to see if anyone wrote about the unusal sighting in 1973.  but i never saw anything.  i did report this years ago to some ufo site i had found on the web but nothing ever came of my report.  i don't even remember now what the site was called.  i saw your site listed on a television program the other day and decided to give it one more try for whatever it is worth. 

  

thank you
content.summary: Approx 6 objects obs west to east stop completely, proceeded south, stopped again and continued east out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: Bardstown rd macdonalds in the highlands.  driving around the back of the store to go through the "drive thru".  looked up and saw object to the east moving north to south at a decent clip.  being in the car and the angle we could not get a picture with our cell phones.  we kept looking for evidence that it was a plane and that with the angle of the sun the wings and tail fins were not eveident.  as it passed we realised there were not any wings or tail finsand that it was longer than a plane.  it was close enough to see it decently.  it moved on to the south.  not a usual flight pattern but not unheard of for planes.  but as we looked it did not have wings or tail fins.Currently i do not wish to be contacted by third parties, but couls change this status if need be.  there was no sound, we had the windows of the car open.
content.summary: Silver long. possibly circumfirence sction dilineating dents

content.detailedDescription:
I have recently come into possession of a few documents and video from area 51, these were given to me by a whistleblower. 

i am looking for someone to aid me in releasing this information to the public.
content.summary: Area 51 photos and documents

content.detailedDescription: My son and i was watching several white and red objects, move , they were going in all directions. flashing and going be hind trees, disappearing and then returning. what a show.
content.summary: My son and i watched several objects in the sky./

content.detailedDescription: Was looking out the window and waw a bright object come over my house, it was white,silver very fast, i saw a shadow on the ground. i wasnt fast enough to go to the front of the house.
content.summary: Saw a bright white and silver go over my house

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cig and skywatching as i always do when outside smoking.  very clear night.  saw two white lights in the distance to the east flying west. thought it might be two lights on either wing of a conventional airplane at first.  as it got closer it became obvious it was not.   as it flew over at about 2,000 to 4,000 ft. (best estimate).  it became obvious it was a triangle.  it had 7 lights on it.  one large red light in the center and 6 smaller white lights.  there were three white lights on the front edge, two on each edge in the middle with the red light in between and one at the point which was the rear of the object.  it made a low hum and was reasonably large.  if i had to guess, i would say one hundred feet or more across at the widest point.  the object was flying somewhat slow as i would say that i watched it for one minute or more to go from east horizon to west out of sight.  my brother pulled up as it was directly overhead and he could see it leaving to the west.
content.summary: Black triangle flying backwards

content.detailedDescription:
After reporting an earlier sighting of a "moving star," i returned outside and was astonished as before i even got the digital camera open, an object from the sw sky came out of no where and instead of starting as "star-like" it was bright as a headlight and quickly dimmed as it moved directly n. 

within 30 seconds it was so dim it faded from view. it was lower in altitude then the other object from less than 1/2 an hour ago.  

i have viewed the video and the object dimmed to quickly to show up on a weak digital camera.
content.summary: Bright starlike object dissapears from view quickly

content.detailedDescription:
This report is to offer some corroboration to a sighting reported from alaska report 28055. that same type ufo was reported and photographed by a gentleman in namibia and also over new hampshire reported on 9/27/2010.   i personally saw the same type object hovering over bryant, arkansas in 2009. i don'remember the exact date. i had just been to the walmart in bryant and was driving west on the service road i happened to look to my right and saw the same type object hovering over the highway 5 area i drove under an overpass and pulled off ino an open area beside the service road. i parked my truck and jumped out with binoculars  to look at the object, which i estmate was only 1000 to 1500 ft. agl. but the object was gone. it took less than a minute to pull over and stop
i proceeded west again on the service road planing to turn around at the spring hill  over pass and cross backover  i-30 to go east on the service road to my home,. but, as i started across the spring hill over pass, i happened to look to my right and could see the same object hovering just to the right of i-30, again at approx 1000-1500 agl. i pulled over and  observed the object with my binocs.  it appeared to be hovering, but as i watched it began slowly descending until the object disappeared behind a tree line in the distance.I then, for some unknown reason, got back in my truck and went home. which is totally a mystery to me as why i did that. hindsight says i should have jumped  back in my truck and roared on to that treeline. but i  didn't and still regret i did not  the sky was a besutiful blue and completely cloudless. bryant is at exit 123 on interstate 30 and the treeline that the object disappeared behind is at exit 114. from the time i first noticed the object and pulled over to look at it it was less than a minute. the elapsed time for my travel to the springhill overpass was less than 2 minutes. in that time, total 3 minutes, the object moved 9 miles you can figure its speed from that. when i saw the namibia picture i realized that was the same type object the same for the new hampshire sighting i copied the nh ufo and am inluding that pic with this report. i do not have a copy of the namibia picture. it should be in the cms data base
content.summary: In reference to report 28055 that ufo seen in multiple locations

content.detailedDescription: Saw orange lights come on again tonight, came on as single lights at first then after a few minutes came on as a row of 6 lights, we waited about 10-15 more minutes then the lights came on again time in a row of 7. please go out there tomorrow around 7:30pm, dont get impatient. watch the sky ..They'll be back. not planes, not flares! no planes were in the sky at all. they stayed lit for about 2 seconds then went out.
content.summary: Orange lights yet again

content.detailedDescription:
After doing a normal nightly scan of the sky, i noticed a strange odd pentagon-like shaped star constellation in the sky i have never seen before. upon saying this outloud to myself, a star just outside the pentagon-like constellation began moving. 

obviously stars dont move, but here in alaska, i have been watching them for some 12 years off and on now, but this is the first one i have caught in quite some time. 

it lasted longer than most "moving stars," as most sightings the objects are moving much faster and out-of-sight within two or three minutes.

this object began in the sw sky and traveled nnw for over four minutes before fading out of view. it was a light white and slightly orange in color. it did not shift from its slow straight path, but was not a satellite either. i would have to say if it was in our planets orbit it must have been at around 60-70+ thousand feet high. 

note: 
my wife reported a ufo for the first time in her life only back in january, in which the following night a strange "blackout" happened in which my wife and i either both had the same dream, or she had an abduction. {ironically, when my dad's mom was 5 months old, he was in the car with my grandmother and grandfather, and my grandmother was abducted in orange county, california in the spring of 1953. i was the first grandson of 7 sisters and brothers, and our son was 9 months old when the "possible" abduction of my wife took place.}
content.summary: Star like moving object at 60-70+ thousand feet

content.detailedDescription:
well it was in the 70;s.My boyfriend and i were parking, in pine gleen management area out side of fort mccllean alabama.We were in the woods in his truck.All of a sudden;; a bright light was on top of his truck,we were so scared.We then thought it was a game wardens truck above  us   on top of the hill.Then we left not saying a word .On the way home we noticed the time,we had been out there 4 hours,we never stayed there ever that long before,and we had light red on our face,we thought it was from kissing each orther.Days later i realised my face was still red his too.We decided not to tell anyone about this,your mind has a way of blocking out strange things.I never told anyone about this till now i could not.I never knew if he did or not,but i will never go back there again.I am older now and i can talk more about it now i watch the skies and pray it want come back.I do know this for sure,if someone really does see a ufo they will not woant to talk about it till years later, if ever, your mind cant handle it,         cathy;;;;
.
content.summary: Big bright light on top of truck

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished jogging, and i was walking up to my house. i was looking at the constellation orion when below and to the right i spotted two red dots traveling at a northwesterly direction. i would estimate that they were traveling at an altitude of about 10,000 ft. i am uncertain about the speed, but it was certainly too slow for meteors. they were then obscured by a small cloud, and did not reappear on the other side. my fist thought was that it was a plane, however the lights were solid, not blinking, and there was  absolutely no sound. in retrospect, i am confident that what i saw was not a plane, meteor, or space junk.
content.summary: Two red dots, moving simultaneously in an oblique angle at the same speed, in a northwesterly direction.  disappeared behind a cloud.

content.detailedDescription: I am filling out this report on behalf of some friends who witnessed and recorded this event.  my friends (3 witnesses in total) were standing in front of their residence which is about a 1/4 mile ne of cisco, tx. they were looking due south toward the town of cisco.  at 7:15pm they began seeing solitary orange lights flash on above the town in various places in the sky and then slowly fade.  the objects appeared to hover.  they would appear in one spot and fade away in the same spot.  finally, one of the witnesses pulled out their phone (a motorola atrix 4g) and began taking video (see attached file). as soon as he began recording (it was 7:45pm at this point), the witnesses immediately viewed one of the orange lights appearing, immediately 5 more lights appeared in succession forming a titled disc pattern in the sky.  once all of the 6 lights were present, all six lights faded in unison.  this particular event is what was captured on the video.  as you can tell from the audio, one witness thought the lights could be flares while another questioned this as there were no planes in the sky at the time.  the lights in the video that are below the ufo are the lights of interstate 20 that runs east/west, just south of cisco.
content.summary: Orange lights make ring in the sky
